subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Probably related to {{och-l|晦|dark}}; in numerous [[Zhou]] texts {{lang|zh|海}} is described as {{lang|zh|晦}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

Compare the parallelism in Chinese: {{och-l|溟|ocean}} < {{och-l|冥|dark}}.
